entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Waterton Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
